scdrake: A Pipeline For 10x Chromium Single-Cell RNA-seq Data Analysis

Source: R/scdrake-package.R
scdrake-package.Rd

This pipeline is implemented in the drake Make-like toolkit and provides the following steps: input quality control, filtering of cells/genes, normalization, clustering, cluster markers, differential expression analysis (constrasts -> cluster vs. cluster), integration of multiple samples. All main parts are accompanied by rich graphical outputs and HTML reports (RMarkdown).

Package options

See get_scdrake_default_options().

Included datasets

For pipeline testing two datasets from 10x Genomics are included:

  • PBMC 1k (v3 chemistry, Cell Ranger 3.0.0)

  • PBMC 3k (v1 chemistry, Cell Ranger 1.1.0). This dataset is used for testing of integration pipeline.

All credits for these datasets go to 10x Genomics. Visit https://www.10xgenomics.com/resources/datasets for more information.

Directories with dataset files can be retrieved by system.file("extdata", "pbmc1k", package = "scdrake", mustWork = TRUE) (or "pbmc3k", respectively).
